mapper.select: SELECT A.order_id AS orderId, A.order_create_customer AS orderCreateCustomer, A.order_create_time AS orderCreateTime, A.order_sum_price AS orderSumPrice, A.order_update_time AS orderUpdateTime, A.order_condition AS orderCondition FROM order_make A WHERE A.is_del = 0 AND A.order_create_customer = #{customerUuid}
